portfolio: Web application with React and Node.js

proposal_templates.web_development: I specialize in modern web development with React, Node.js, and Python. I can deliver high-quality, scalable applications with clean code and comprehensive testing.
proposal_templates.mobile_development: I have extensive experience in mobile development, including creating Call of Duty Mobile-style games with Kivy and Pygame. I can build cross-platform mobile applications.
proposal_templates.game_development: I specialize in game development, particularly mobile FPS games. I can create complete game engines with 3D graphics, AI enemies, and multiplayer support.
proposal_templates.automation: I excel at automation and can create intelligent systems that streamline workflows and improve efficiency.
proposal_templates.default: I am a professional developer with expertise in multiple technologies. I deliver high-quality code with comprehensive documentation and testing.
